translators.translators.PowerflowSimulator¶

class translators.translators.PowerflowSimulator(network, injections)¶

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representing the basic structure for the power flow adapters

Parameters:

  • network (class:Network.Network) – Common network element to be simulated

  • injections – Common injection element that stores time data regarding loads and generators
